title: TSM ROSTER
body:
TOP:IMPACT
JUNGLE:RUSH
MID:BJERGSEN
ADC:DOUBLELIFT
SUPPORT:ADRIAN

give me your throughts?

replies.body:
1) Sub out Adrian.

2) Probably not happening anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=Linthe,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=I2NOeaum,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-03T15:03:51.039+0000)
>
> 1) Sub out Adrian.
> 
> 2) Probably not happening anyway.

adrian is a top supp in na, and this can't happen anyways

> [{quoted}](name=LazerFruit,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=I2NOeaum,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-11-06T01:45:16.428+0000)
>
> adrian is a top supp in na, and this can't happen anyways

I think Adrian is a just a guy... But it's all opinions anyway... I think FuFu would be a better fit.. He can take the shot calling off Bjerg's hands at the same time.

> [{quoted}](name=Linthe,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=I2NOeaum,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-11-06T14:57:53.064+0000)
>
> I think Adrian is a just a guy... But it's all opinions anyway... I think FuFu would be a better fit.. He can take the shot calling off Bjerg's hands at the same time.

FuFuu is prob 1-2nd best supp in NA, but it's highly unlikely he is leaving GV

> [{quoted}](name=LazerFruit,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=I2NOeaum,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-06T17:52:07.457+0000)
>
> FuFuu is prob 1-2nd best supp in NA, but it's highly unlikely he is leaving GV

Agreed. This whole thread is pie in the sky. But fun :)

Impact, Rush and Bjergsen would make 3 foreign players - Riot's limit is 2, maximum.

As such, it'd be more likely that they'll get a local toplaner like Hauntzer, Quas or ZionSpartan.
next year bjergsen is considered NA based
hai needs to go to tsm lmao op

Do it.  Just do it.

And add five more players to the roster and have them compete inside TSM so that you can play the best of each pair game to game.  Stop dropping talent from your roster.  Why would you even do that after watching SKT T1 run an active substitute for Faker?  I mean

**THEY RAN A SUBSTITUTE PLAYER FOR FREAKIN' FAKER**!!!

if that doesn't make your mind explode, then what will?
So we're sending all of TiP to TSM? Seems legit.
NOW TSM IS THE BEST NA TEAM.{{item:3070}} CLG,{{item:3070}} CLOUD9 AND ANY OTHER NA TEAMS
